europeana:record.dc:title: Met mariene ongewervelden geassocieerde roeipootkreeftjes in Nederland (Crustacea: Copepoda)
Nederlandse Faunistische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Faasse M.A.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Arthropoda
Nederland
Verspreiding
Ecologie
europeana:record.dc:description: Copepods associated with marine invertebrates in the Netherlands (Crustacea: Copepoda) An overview is presented of all published observations of copepods associated with marine invertebrates in the Netherlands, supplemented with observations of the author. Twenty-eight species have been recorded, seven of which have been discovered since 1990. For four species mentioned in this article there were no autochthonous records from the Netherlands: Paranthessius anemoniae, Zygomolgus tenuifurcatus, Harrietella simulans and Donsiella limnoriae.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Met mariene ongewervelden geassocieerde roeipootkreeftjes in Nederland (Crustacea: Copepoda) (URN:ISSN:01692453) (Volume 19)
